email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. Following up on our call earlier, I’m pleased to provide a freight quote for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We’re looking at a rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton, based on a cargo size of 80,000 MT. The vessel we’re considering is the MV Ocean Star, a 2015-built Aframax with a DWT of 115,000 and LOA of 240 meters. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? We’re looking at loading between October 15-20. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.50 per metric ton, which is competitive given the vessel’s specifications. The laycan is confirmed for October 15-20, and the vessel will be ready at Houston on the 14th. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 sounds more reasonable. However, we’d like to lock in a demurrage rate of $15,000 per day, pro rata, in case of delays. Also, could you confirm the vessel’s draft and any restrictions at Rotterdam? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. The demurrage rate of $15,000 per day is acceptable. The MV Ocean Star has a draft of 14.5 meters, and there are no restrictions at Rotterdam for this vessel. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement with these terms. Let me know if there’s anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. Let’s aim to finalize by end of day. Thanks for your help, John
